content: this is my 300 pattern and is my gift to all you wonderful knitters my gift to you is a classic cardigan for any boy or girl this is knit top down with an offset button front the adorable handmade buttons can be found in the etsy shop katrinkles 1 the yarn is in ooakknits 2 the italian translation was done by ajroldi 3 danish translation done by yarnbook 1 https //www etsy com/shop/katrinkles 2 https //www etsy com/shop/ooakknits 3 http //www ravelry com/people/ajroldi
